Enum BadgeGlobals.BadgeTypes

The various types of Badges (what the actual Badges are).

The values are defined by each Badge type's Type Number. If Badges exist in the same spot and aren't in both games, Badges with lower alphabetical values will be placed first. In cases where one Badge is before another Badge in one game and after that Badge in the other game, the Badge is grouped with similar Badges around it.

If adding brand new badges, put them at the bottom.

Namespace: PaperMarioBattleSystem
Assembly: PaperMarioBattleSystem.dll
Syntax
public enum BadgeTypes
